name: Summer and Love
description:
Summer 1994

Claudia and her brother are invited by their grandparents to spend three weeks at a seaside town.

On the first day, Claudia goes to the beach and  sit near the end of a breakwater. She loves to stare at  the sea and watching all the small sea animals moving around. After a short while, a girl asks if she wants to join her and her friends that are playing on the beach. 

How will her summer turns out ?

- Play time is about 30-40 minutes.

 - 2 endings.

Story by Myself

This is my first visual novel  and I am not a writer so I am sorry if it may look weird or anything.
